name: I Like Football
description:
You like football? We do too!

Based on feedback and interesting user experiences, we developed the "I like football" app, where you can dive into different football topics - all mixed in one app. Play it now and give it a try to find out how familiar you are with the world of football!

Our app has 6 levels with increasing difficulty. Every level has 6 different rounds, where you will be challenged to make the needed points in order to move forward and unlock the next round. After completing all the rounds successfully, you will unlock the next level.

Round 1: Quiz questions
Round 2: Penalty shooting
Round 3: Football Hangman
Round 4: Penalty saving
Round 5: Brick game
Round 6: Squash the walking figures
